text:
Tomcat 4.01 is case sentitive to the directoy name web-inf. This causes it not 
able to read the web.xml under the directory. The directory name has to be WEB-
INF. This is not an issue for the previous release.
creator: jlin@snapappliances.com
remm@apache.org
text:
Unless I missed something, the servlet specification mandates case-sensitivity. 
Otherwise, your webapp isn't portable (since Tomcat running under a Unix system 
wouldn't find your /web-inf/web.xml). Which version of Tomcat are you refering 
to ?
